View from top of chairlift to Cota (2625m high) overlooking La Coma part of the Arcalís ski area

and lies in the northwestern corner of the border parish (administrative division) of
. The location can be seen at the true head of the El Serrat valley some 25km north of

.

It appears to be popular with French and Spanish tourists and is largely unknown amongst English speaking tourists

and continue to El Serrat and follow the signposting (road to left)

SnoBus runs during the ski season from La Vella

The ski area consists of a block of buildings at the head of the valley containing a ticket office to buy your life pass, a ski rental shop and a restaurant / cafe / bar.

This is the main access point to the Arcalis lift system.
is a ski area and has no village.
It is possible to buy the Vallnord ski pass at a ticket office at this location..
The ski center has a restaurant and bar

There is a cafe and bar at base of the ski and lift centre beside the road.

There is a restaurant and bar over the mountain at the base of the main blue runs in the second half of the ski area.
The ski slopes have no resort as yet and the nearest popular hotels down the valley are listed in order of distance:

value: Hotel Bringue ***, El Serrat (10mins from skiing)
Aparthotel AnnaPurna ***, Ansalonga, Llorts n of Ordino
Aparthotel Arans *, La Cortinada (in the village of Arans 1.5km N or Ordino)
Cal Daina, La Cortinada - nr Arans  (Up in the hills. Really rural)
Hotel Coma ***, Ordino (beautiful hotel, unfortunate name)
